column1: ekaviMSati stotra
namaH tAre ture vIre kzaNa dyuti niBa IkzaNe
column2: @299b / /rgya gar skad du /nam:t'a ra ae ka bi sha ti stvo tra gu na hi ta s'a ka / bod skad du / sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bstod pa phan yon dang bcas pa / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo // phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo // spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma //

column1: trElokya nATa vaktra abja vikasat kesara udBave  nevs
column2: 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi // ge sar bye ba las ni byung ma //

column1: namaH SAnta sarat candra saMpUrNa pawala Anane tAre sahasra vikalpa prahasat kiraNa ujjvale  nevs
column2: phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun tu // gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i @300a *// zhal ma // skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis //

column1: namaH kanaka nIla abja pANi padma viBUzite
column2: rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma // phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyi // padmas phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma // sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba //

column1: dAna vIrya tapaH kzAnti titikzA DyAna gocare  nevs
column2: bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma //

column2: phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor // mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bar spyod ma //

column1: aSeza pAramitA prApta jina putra nizevite  nevs
column2: ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i // rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu bsten ma //

column1: namaH tuttAra hUMkAra pUrita ASA Adi gantare
column2: phyag 'tshal tutt'a ra h'um yi ge / 'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma //

column1: sapta loka krama AkrAntAH aSeza AkarzaNa kzaNe  nevs
column2: 'jig rten bdun po zhabs kyis mnan te // lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma //

column1: namaH Sakra nara brahma marut viSva ISvara arcite
column2: phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa // rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma //

column1: BUta vetAla ganDarva gaNa puraskRte  nevs
column2: 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang // gnod sbyin tshogs kyi mdun nas bstod ma //

column1: namaH tratri triPawkAre para mantra pramardani
column2: phyag 'tshal trad ces bya dang phat kyis // pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma //

column2: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te // me 'bar 'khrugs pa shin tu 'bar ma //

column1: namaH ture mahA Gore mAra vIra vinASani
column2: phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen mo // bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma //

column1: BRkuwI kRta vaktra abja sarva duzwa nisUdani  nevs
column2: chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad // dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma //

column1: namaH tri ratna mudrA aFke hRdya aFguli viBUzite
column2: phyag @300b 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya'i // sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma // ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i // rang gi 'od kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i //

column1: BUzita aSeza diS cakra nikare su kula Akule  nevs
column2: rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrug ma // phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' ba brjid pa'i //

column1: namaH pramudita Awopa mukuwa Akzipta sAriNi
column2: dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng ba spel ma // bzhad pa rab bzhad tu tutt'a ra yis //

column1: hasat prahasat tuttAre mAra loka BayaMkari
column2: bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma //

column1: namaH samanta BUpAla apAtAla AkarzaNa kzaNe
column2: phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams // thams cad 'gugs par nus ma nyid ma //

column1: BRkuwi kRta hUMkAre sarva Apada vimocani
column2: khro gnyer g-yo ba'i yi ge h'um gis // phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma //

column1: namaH SiKaNxa KaNxa indu mukuwa ABaraNa ujjvale
column2: phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan // brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma //

column1: amita ABa taTA BAre BAsvare kiraNa Druve
column2: ral pa'i khrod na 'od dpag med las // rtag par shin tu 'od ni mdzad ma // phyag 'tshal bskal pa mtha' ma'i me ltar // 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma // g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum kun nas bskor dgas // dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma //

column1: namaH kara tala AGAta caraNa Ahata BU tale BRkuwi kRta hUMkAra sapta pAtAla nASini namaH kalpa anta hutaBuj jvAlA mAlA antare sTite
column2: phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi / mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdung ma //

column1: AlIXa mudita abadDa ripu cakra vinASini
column2: khro gnyer can mdzad yi ge h'um gis // rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma //

column1: namaH Sive SuBe SAnte SAnta nirvANa gocare
column2: phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma // mya ngan 'das zhi spyod yul nyid ma // sv'ah'a aom dang yang dag ldan pas // sdig @301a *//

column1: svAhA praNamya saMyukte mahApAtaka nASini
column2: pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma //

column1: namaH pramudita abadDa ripu gAtra praBedani
column2: phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor rab dga' ba'i // dgra yi lus ni rab tu 'gems ma //

column1: daSa akzara pAda nyAse vidyA huMkAra dIpite namaH ture pAda AGAte huMkAra kAra jIvite
column2: yi ge bcu pa'i dag ni bkod pa'i // rig pa h'um las sgron ma nyid ma // phyag 'tshal tu re'i zhabs ni brdabs pas // h'um gi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma //

column1: meru maNxala ka elASa BUvana traya cAraNi
column2: ri rab man d'a ra dang 'bigs byed // 'jig rten gsum rnams g-yo ba nyid ma //

column1: namaH sura asara AkAra hariNI ka kare sTite
column2: phyag 'tshal lha yi mtsho yi rnam pa'i // ri dvags rtags can phyag na bsnams ma // t'a ra gnyis brjod phat kyi yi ges //

column1: harat virukta PawkAra aSeza viSana ASini
column2: dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma //

column1: namaH sura gaNa yakza asura kinnara sevite
column2: phyag 'tshal lha yi tshogs rnams rgyal po // lha dang mi 'am ci yis bsten ma // kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis //

column1: AbadDa mudita ABoga kari duHsvapna nASini
column2: rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma //

column1: namaH candra arka saMpUrNa nayana dyuti svaBAsvare
column2: phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa'i // spyan gnyis po la 'od rab gsal ma // har gnyis brjod tu tat'a ra yis //

column1: tAra dvirukta uttAre vizamajvala nASini
column2: shin tu drag po'i rims nad sel ma //

column1: namaH tri tala vinyAse Siva Sakti samanvite graha veta Ala yakza Adya nASani pravare ture
column2: phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas // zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma // gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams; ;'joms pa tu re rab mchog nyid ma //

column1: mantra mUlam idam stotram namaskAra ekaviMSati
column2: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bstod pa 'di dang // phyag 'tshal ba ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ///

column1: yaH paWet prAyaSas DImAn devyAH Bakti samanvitaH
column2: lha mo la gus yang dag lnga ni pa'i; ;blo ldan gang gis rab dad brjod pas //

column1: saH yam vA prAtar utTAya smaret sarva aBaya pradam
column2: srod dang tho rangs langs par byas nas // dran pas mi 'jigs thams cad rab ster //

column1: sarva pApa praSamanam sarva durgati nASanam
column2: sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi @301b ba // ngan 'gro thams cad 'joms pa nyid do // rgyal ba bye ba phrag bdun rnams kyis //

column1: aBiziktA uBaya tUrNam asmin mahat tAm AsAdya
column2: myur du dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur la // 'di las che ba nyid ni 'thob cing // sangs rgyas go 'phang mthar thug der 'gro //

column1: vizam tasya mahA Goram smaraNAt pralayam yAnti
column2: de yi dug ni drag po chen po // brtan gnas pa'am gzhan yang 'gro ba // zos pa dang ni 'thungs pa nyid kyang //

column1: graha jvala viza ArtAnAm anyezAm ca eva satvAnAm
column2: dran pas rab tu sel ba nyid thob; ;gdon dang rims dang dug gis gzir ba'i // sdug bsngal tshogs ni rnam par spang ste // sems can gzhan pa rnams la yang ngo // gnyis gsum bdun du mngon par brjod na //

column1: putra kAmaH laBet putram sarva kAmAn avApnoti saptABiH jina kowiBiH saH nte bOdDa padam vrajet sTAvaram vA aTa jaFgamam sAj idam pIxam eva ca parama Arti vinASanam dvi tri sapta aBivartinAm
column2: bu 'dod pas ni bu thob 'gyur zhing // nor 'dod pas ni nor rnams nyid 'thob // 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur te //

column1: Dana kAmaH laBet Danam na viGnEH pratihanyate
